short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the chrome extension for iProctor, the proctoring module of Assess App.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For more information, about iProctor visit https://eluminaelearning.com.au/secure-proctoring-solutions/

The iProctor extension enhances the security of online exams by working with your current Learning Management System (LMS) or Assess App SaaS software, enabling you to easily use the iProctor solution from Assess App in your LMS or Assess App online testing platform.

By installing this extension, you authorize screen viewing during exams for added security.

Please remember:

• iProctor will only monitor you during your exam session.
• Your personal information is safe and will never be shared or sold to a third party.
• iProctor will not access any personal data not required for the exam itself.
• Prior to the exam, Google Chrome will ask for your permission.
• The permissions you agree to are only required during the exam and will never be used outside of the exam session.

This Extension allows users taking online exams to:
• Share their screen during an exam
• Share their webcam during an exam
• Record any and all events that take place in the browser during an exam
